price: 67.Kuwa gaalooba waxay dhahaan: Ma markaan noqonno carro, innaga iyo aabba- yaashayo, miyaa nala soo bixin (mar kale)?
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
